text:
STAFF DESIGNATIONS
Executive Staff
Officers of the Corporation
Division Executive Directors
NAEB Management Consultant
Administrative Staff
Executive Staff, plus:
Convention Coordinator
Newsletter Editor
Project Directors, Associate Directors, and Assistant Directors
Division Associate and Assistant Directors
Chief Accountant
Secretary to the President
Journal Editor
Network Manager
Clerical Staff
All personnel not listed above shall be considered members
of the Clerical Staff,
6/1/66
